task_description: Build payment gateway integration layer with provider abstraction, implement payment processing APIs, create webhook handlers for payment events, and develop admin dashboard for transaction monitoring.
Develop centralized authentication service with OAuth 2.0/OIDC flows, JWT token management, MFA implementation, SSO integration, and RBAC authorization engine.
Redesign order processing system with event-driven architecture, implement inventory sync service, build multi-warehouse routing logic, and create shipping carrier integrations.
Build claims processing pipeline with EDI 837/835 parsing, eligibility verification API, automated adjudication rules engine, and EOB document generation. Includes HIPAA compliance and audit logging.

Develop provider directory with Elasticsearch-based search, real-time availability calendar, credentialing workflow engine, and quality metrics dashboard. Includes NPI validation and network tier management.
Build notification orchestration platform with multi-channel delivery (email, SMS, push), template management system, preference center, delivery tracking, and regulatory compliance engine.

Create analytics platform with dashboard builder, real-time data streaming, KPI calculation engine, report scheduling, and data export capabilities. Includes role-based access control for data security.
